content: {"name": "H.O.P.E Family Resource Center", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Located in Mickey Market Place Suite 120", "email": "", "url": "https://hopefamilyresourcecenter.org/events-page", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6108 Mableton Parkway", "address_2": null, "city": "Mableton", "state_province": "GA", "postal_code": "30126", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 33.8051881, "longitude": -84.56974149999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(678) 310-0525", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": ""}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: twice a month"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Food pantry: Needs to fill out a form"}]}
